template <typename T>
class vsip::impl::Rt_pointer
File: ../../../vsip/core/layout.hpp

Class to represent either a interleaved-pointer or a split-pointer.

Primary definition handles non-complex types. Functions corresponding to split-pointer cause a runtime error, since "split" does not make sense for non-complex types.

Specializations:
Rt_pointer<std::complex<T>>
